response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its market value and the quality it provides, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it will bring to you. I'm confident it will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
